title: Typos in lucene-join package info javadoc
description:
Steps:
-view the "Query-time joins" section of the lucene-join package javadoc https://lucene.apache.org/core/6_4_0/join/index.html?org/apache/lucene/search/join/package-summary.html

Expected behaviour:
The example Java code is valid.

Actual behaviour:
There are some typos.

[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=bb9b423 ]

LUCENE-7666: Fix typos in lucene-join package info javadoc. (Tom Saleeba via Christine Poerschke)
